name: Golden Reaper

skills.name: Harvest of Blood
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of decreasing the cooldown of one of a random ally's Skills by 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Maelstrom
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Decreases the Turn Meter of each target by 20% if they are not under a [Decrease ATK] debuff.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Alacrity
skills.raw_description: Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns and boosts their Turn Meter by 20%

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Golden Reaper is a epic assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Golden Reaper is a champion of Epic rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Golden Reaper

default_description: Golden Reaper is a epic assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage
